item.title: Kitab Club Mobile App
item.dc:creator: mohan
item.description:
KitabClub mobile app is also hybrid mobile application that was compiled with phonegap. In this app We have used CSS3, HTML5, cordova etc. Tool/Resource Kendo UI Mobile jQuery PhoneGap Cordova SQL Server 2008 ASP.NET Web API ASP.NET MVC 3 ASP.NET WinForms

The post Kitab Club Mobile App appeared first on Mohan Khadka - A Front-End Developer.
item.content:encoded:
KitabClub mobile app is also hybrid mobile application that was compiled with phonegap. In this app We have used CSS3, HTML5, cordova etc.

Tool/Resource
Kendo UI Mobile
jQuery
PhoneGap
Cordova
SQL Server 2008
ASP.NET Web API
ASP.NET MVC 3
ASP.NET WinForms
